text: NdipoIfetikadatumizaBukulaKoranimuchiyankhulo china osati Chiarabu, iwo akadanena kuti, “Kodi bwanji mawu ake sali kufotokozeredwa bwinobwino? Chiyani! Chiyankhulo cha chilendo osati Chiarabu!” Nena, “Ilo ndi la iwo amene amakhulupirira, ndi chilangizo ndiponso mankhwala ochiritsa. Ndipo iwo amene sakhulupirira, makutu awo ndi ogontha ndipo ilo ndi khungu kwa iwo. Iwo ndiwo amene amaitanidwa kuchokera kutali.”
